#summary Use Case: PostGrades
#labels UseCase,Teacher
==UseCases==


= PostGrades=


|| Use Case || PostGrades ||
||Identified || T7 ||
|| Description: || The PostGrades use case models Teacher posting Grades for an Assignment.|| 
||Actors|| Teacher||
|| Preconditions: || 1. User successfully logged in as Teacher via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when Teacher decides to post his Grades.||
||                ||2. Teacher clicks the Post Grades button.||
||                ||3. Teacher prompted to select a class from a list of options.||
||                ||4. Teacher sees a spreadsheet of assignments and students for the chosen class.||
||                ||5. Teacher enters and/or changes one or more Grades in the spreadsheet.||
||                ||6. Teacher presses the Post Grades button.||
||Post Condition: ||1. Teacher returns to the screen to select a class to post grades for (step 3).||
||                ||2. Grades for selected class updated.||
